frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-improved-osk
frozen.shortDescription: Makes Gnome's onscreen keyboard more useable with e.g. more keys.
frozen.longDescription:
Makes Gnome's onscreen keyboard more useable with e.g. more keys.
This extension is a fork of https://extensions.gnome.org/extension/3330/improved-onscreen-keyboard/ by SebastianLuebke.
